ui.pillars.title: Pillars
contributor.pillars.lead.description: Lead developer and artist (It's only me ;-;).
item.pillars.pillar_controller.lore_1: RMB to activate the nearest pillar.
item.pillars.pillar_controller.lore_2: Shift+RMB for the nearest pillar to be destroyed.
item.pillars.pillar_controller.lore_3: RMB while airborne to deactivate the nearest pillar.
item.pillars.pillar_spawner.lore_1: RMB to place a pillar root to build upon.
